title: What can I do when Pixel Stand stop working?
content:
My Pixel Stand is not working.
I ordered it to be purchased in November, and it arrived in my hands in mid-December. Everything was fine, but at the end of January it started to show an orange light, I disconnected and reconnected it and it kept working, but at the point it just stopped working.
Today, when I plug it in and put my Pixel in, I get a "Re-align your phone" sign, and if I plug it in with the phone previously placed on it, the orange LED lights up. 
I have tried it with my Pixel Buds that used to charge perfectly and it doesn't work either.  What I can do?
